title: Episode 3 - Reaching For The Stars
description:
"I truly believe that if you do what you love, the money will come."
Reaching For The Stars
Crystal Wright
Crystal is my business coach and the first person that said, I believe you can do it & I will show you the road map on how to get there. You'll hear us explore what blind trust is and why it is essential for growth with your coach.
Show Topics:
How to identify that someone is qualified to be your coach
Why pitching yourself is necessary in business
Why deciding where you want to go in your career is important BEFORE securing an agent
What are you providing for your community?
The difference between Money vs. Passion
--
Crystal Wright gets people unstuck! She helps beauty artists to find and use their outside voices to accomplish their goals, be productive, feel respected, and confident about their futures.
As a recognized expert on building freelance businesses from the foundation up, she is known for turning struggling entrepreneurs into courageous business bosses.
As a successful author, mentor, business strategist and personal development coach, Crystal brings decades of leadership and entrepreneurial experience within the beauty and entertainment industries to bear through her online business courses, self-help books and one-on-one coaching program.
“I give women the tools they need to become more disciplined, organized, savvy and courageous negotiators and bosses.”
Crystal is the author of The Hair Makeup & Fashion Styling Career Guide, also known as the beauty industry bible. She is also a creator of successful business classes and programs for freelance artists, including the Win Now Mentorship Program that helps freelance beauty artists become confident, courageous business bosses. You can purchase her book, signup for her programs, and contact her through crystalwrightlive.com and on Instagram @crystalwrightlive.
--
This is Delina's village and you're about to be a part of it. Welcome to It Takes A Village, The True Story of A Beautypreneur.
For more info and show notes please visit delinamedhin.com.
Join us by shouting out and celebrating your village by using the hashtag #ShareYourVillage
